message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with the task of human pose estimation from images, which is a common problem in computer vision (cs.CV). The approach involves synthesizing training images, which could fall under the graphics sub-category (cs.GR). The use of convolutional neural networks (CNNs) is a key aspect of the paper, which could also place it in the machine learning sub-category (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper involves sampling the human pose space, which could be considered a form of optimization or search, potentially placing it in the artificial intelligence sub-category (cs.AI). Finally, the use of texture information from real images could also relate to multimedia (cs.MM).
